long_description: The North Face Overhaul 40 Daypack makes travel easy, whether you're headed for a weekend getaway or a cross-country flight. Its laptop panel opens flat so you can cruise through airport security. Back panel with sleeves for a tablet and a 15 in. laptop unzips to lie flat for security screening. Back panel also features a convenient pass-through slot for easily sliding the bag onto your luggage handle. Stowable shoulder straps and side handle transform the backpack into a horizontal briefcase-style bag. Bottom zippered pocket is great for isolating dirty shoes or laundry. Expandable zippered gusset lets you adjust the volume to carry more or less. Large front fleece-lined pocket is perfect for your phone, camera or sunglasses. Internal organization panel keeps all other gear safe and organized. Molded, padded shoulder straps and back panel add comfort; winged hipbelt, a sternum strap and load lifters customize the fit. External water-bottle pockets double as quick stash pockets. The North Face Overhaul 40 Daypack features multiple interior pockets and sleeves so you can find what you need quickly.
short_description: The North Face Overhaul 40 Daypack makes travel easy, whether you're headed for a weekend getaway or a cross-country flight. Its laptop panel opens flat so you can cruise through airport security.
